JGAL

Class GAL_GeneticOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_GeneticOperator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GAL_ChromosomeMutation, GAL_ClassicMutation, GAL_Crossover, GAL_Inversion, GAL_RandomCrossover, GAL_ShuffleMutation, GAL_SwapMutation

    public abstract class GAL_GeneticOperator
extends java.lang.Object
    The GAL_GeneticOperator is an abstract class for the genetic operators.

    Subclasses of GAL_GeneticOperator must provide methods for applyOperator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double prob
      Probability of ocurrence for the genetic operator
      protected java.util.Random rand
      Random object wich can be used inside the others methods as distributeChromosomes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GAL_GeneticOperator

        public GAL_GeneticOperator(double prob)
        Constructs a new GAL_GeneticOperator and initializes the rand field.

        If the probability is out of the range [0,1], the prob will take the closest value in the range. As Example. The probability 1.5 is equal to probability 1 and the probability -1 is equal to probability 0.

        Parameters:
        prob - Probability of ocurrence for the genetic operator.

    • Method Detail

      • setProb

        public void setProb(double prob)
        Sets a new prob field value.
        Parameters:
        prob - The probability to be set.

      • getProb

        public double getProb()
        Gets the prob field value.
        Returns:
        The prob field value.

      • applyOperator

        public abstract GAL_Population applyOperator(GAL_Population fathers,
                           GAL_ChromosomeConfig config)
                                      throws NotValidOperationException
        Applies the operator for a Population given as the first parameter under the restrictions given by the chromosome configuration.
        Parameters:
        fathers - Population thats going to be modified by the operator.
        config - The configuration for the chromosomes of the current and next generation.
        Returns:
        A new population created after applying the operator.
        Throws:
        NotValidOperationException - If an operation can't be done with the given parameters.
